Title: Undertale Yellow
Description: A fan-made prequel to Undertale, led by MasterSwordRemix.

Title: Nighttale
Description: A fan-made prequel to Undertale, led and developed by TDRP.

Title: HorrorTale
Description: A new story years after a neutral route caused by Frisk.

Title: TS!Underswap
Description: UNDERTALE, but everyone's positions have been swapped.

Title: UNDERTALE 2
Description: A fan-made sequel to UNDERTALE made in RPG Maker.

Title: Undertale Red & Yellow
Description: Undertale but with Little Red Slicing Hood and Clover from Undertale Red & Yellow.

Title: Undertale: Kissy Cutie
Description: Undertale but as a dating simulator.

Title: Runetale
Description: A proof-of-concept of Undertale if playable through Chara's POV.

Title: Undertale: Last Breath
Description: An AU if Sans swore to his last breath to pull out all the stops to end your rampage.

Title: M00NZYTALE
Description: An UNDERTALE-inspired fan-game where an alien creature from the moon falls into a world of insects.

Title: DELTATRAVELER
Description: A DELTARUNE fan game based on the 'GOD DAMNIT KRIS WHERE THE HELL ARE WE' meme.
